questions.questionText: It takes Venus 243 Earth years to do a full rotation on its axis, but 225 Earth days to do an orbit of the sun. Therefore,
options: A night on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
A day on Venus is shorter than a year on Venus.
A night on Venus is shorter than a year on Venus.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
